string-array.name: ww1_questions
string-array.item: When did Austria-Hungary declare war on Serbia?
When did Arab nationalists revolt against Ottoman rule?
When did United States declare war on Germany?
When did Germany sign the armistice?

string-array.name: ww2_questions
string-array.item: When was World War II initiated in Europe?
When did United States enter World War II?
When did German armed forces surrender unconditionally to the Allies?
When did United States drop an atomic bomb on Hiroshima?
